title: Money: More Than Just Math—It’s Identity, Memory, and Meaning
subtitle: Understand the deeper emotional aspects of money and how a good advisor can help reflect your values.
content:
Money: More Than Just Math—It’s Identity, Memory, and Meaning

If an advisor ever opens with, "Trust me, I'll beat the stock market," I would run. That line is a relic from the 1980s, like a Wall Street VHS tape stuck on repeat. It's not just outdated; it is a massive red flag.

Decades of academic research have made it abundantly clear: most advisors do not beat the market over time, especially after fees. The best advisors aren't trying to be magicians; they're trying to be mirrors. They reflect your values and keep your future self from sabotaging your present one.

And in the long run, that will beat any market.
